response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. However, to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to offer you this remarkable asset at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in its ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
